lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova, the United States Open champion, defeated Timea Bacsinszky, 6-4, 6-3, yesterday to reach the Zurich Open semifinals and boost her chances of finishing the year atop the world rankings. Sharapova next will play Katarina Srebotnik of Slovenia, who advanced by defeating Maria Kirilenko, 6-3, 6-2.
